name: SoarAudio
0:
”Alexa, open Soar Audio”
”What can I search for?”
”Search for dreams.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soar audio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Search for inspirational audio content with Soar Audio. 
Try the following:
• Start tutorial
• What can I search for?
• Search for <keywords>
• Search for <speaker>
• Search for <keywords> by <speaker>
• Sleep timer 30 minutes
• Help
• Repeat
• Start Over
• Stop or Goodbye (to leave skill)

To search, start query with one of these words: search, look, find.

To start a playlist, play <playlist name>

Brief mode on/off - BRIEF mode replaces some voice prompts with a BEEP.
More content added each month.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
